description.para: The ping_icmp module provide ICMP checks against targets. It sends a series of ICMP requests and waits for their responses tallying their turn-around time.

checkconfig.parameter: The number of milliseconds between ICMP requests.
The number of ICMP requests to send during a single check.

example.title: Ping checks against a host
example.para: Ping 4.2.2.1 once a second for ten seconds recurring every 60 seconds.
